Destroy Sequence Element: You can call this action whenever you wish to "destroy" a previously created sequence element. You give the element ID, as returned by the action Create Sequence Element, and this action will destroy it, removing it from the room.
The ID of the sequence element to destroy.
The above action block code checks for to see if the sequence element stored in the variable "my_seq" exists and if it does, it then destroys it.
